name: Little Lost Robots
description: Little Lost Robots is a challenging puzzle game designed for players who want a proper mental workout. Help the robots reach the rescue portal by placing a sequence of commands for them to follow, pressing play, and hoping nothing crashes!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: intel 7 Memory: 8 MB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GEFORCE 540M DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 50 MB available space
